Sentencas: Ferritic Fe-Cr alloy is one of the most important metallic interconnect material for the solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Molecular dynamics simulations of interaction and very first step oxidation in the surface of ferritic Fe-Cr alloy

Sentencas: And its antioxidant performance is vital to the operation of SOFCs.
Titulo: Molecular dynamics simulations of interaction and very first step oxidation in the surface of ferritic Fe-Cr alloy

Sentencas: Based on the ReaxFF reactive potential, the interactions between incident O ion and the (001) surface of ferritic Fe-Cr alloy are simulated by classical molecular dynamics.
Titulo: Molecular dynamics simulations of interaction and very first step oxidation in the surface of ferritic Fe-Cr alloy

Sentencas: When the incident O ion collides with the surface, adsorption, reflection and sputtering of O ion are observed, and adsorption is the dominant interaction.
Titulo: Molecular dynamics simulations of interaction and very first step oxidation in the surface of ferritic Fe-Cr alloy

Sentencas: The incident O ions are found to be adsorbed at tetrahedral interstitial positions between Fe and Cr atoms in the top Fe-Cr mixed layer and be adsorbed closely around Fe atoms in the deeper pure Fe layers when incident with different initial kinetic energies.
Titulo: Molecular dynamics simulations of interaction and very first step oxidation in the surface of ferritic Fe-Cr alloy

Sentencas: And our results reveal that Fe-O compounds are easier to form with the increasing kinetic energy of incident O ion and increasing temperature.
Titulo: Molecular dynamics simulations of interaction and very first step oxidation in the surface of ferritic Fe-Cr alloy

Sentencas: The oxidation behavior in the surface is analyzed and a proposal is finally provided for improving antioxidant performance of the Fe-Cr alloy applied in the solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Molecular dynamics simulations of interaction and very first step oxidation in the surface of ferritic Fe-Cr alloy
